**Armor Alley: Remastered**
---
~~~
                            ▄██▀      
                          ▄█▀         
          ▄████▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄ █▀▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄

      ▄         ▄████████████████▄

       ████▄▄███████████████████████▀ 
      ████████▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀████▀█▀▀▀▀█▀
       ██▀              ██▘▘ ██▘▘

 A R M O R  A L L E Y :: R E M A S T E R E D
~~~

This is the distribution path for "transpiled" (concatenated, minified etc.) HTML + JS + CSS + spritesheet assets used on the production site.

The project uses `gulp-cli` (npm) for its build process. Following an `npm install` from the root directory, run `gulp`.

For notes on development, see [src/README.md](../src/README.md).
